articles.title: What to do if a health worker contracts coronavirus: Health ministry issues guidelines for states, UTs - The Indian Express
articles.description: The guidelines are applicable for COVID-19 healthcare facilities (public and private) that are already receiving or preparing to receive suspected or confirmed coronavirus patients as well as non-Covid healthcare facilities.
